title: @Riot, Void and Bandle City Crests and Icons
body:
First of all, I would like to compliment Riot on a perfect launch of the new Runeterra map. Its truly beautiful, and its in the visual and interactive format I always wanted to see for this world. Cant wait to see more projects Riot comes up for it in the future (and some other projects like the Timeline ;)  )

But the issues that bug me are emphasized with the return of certain icons and inclusion of new icons for the in-game Runeterra Map missions. 
Every older Faction icon return as obtainable icons (which is awesome, I know some friends that really like to get icons like Piltover or Noxus  but missed them initially so this is just amazing for them), but why isnt the Void icon included as well? Is it because it can also work/categorized as a Race icon similar to the recent Darkin icon?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/7b/Void_profileicon.png/revision/latest?cb=20180221204437

Also why didnt Bandle City get its own Icon made and included as an obtainable icon through missions?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/68/Bandle_City_Crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20180724185419
The Amazing Runeterra map included this new Crest For Bandle City and it looks so good not to make an summoner icon for it.

Also Could you update the Universe faction site so that it incorporates these new colored crests for Bandle City and Void that are introduced in the Runeterra map?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/cb/Void_Crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20180724201159

Thank you so much Riot for your time, hopefully you reconsider some of my suggestions, or at least answer some of these conundrums that were missed in this recent massive Lore Update.

replies.body:
We simply have not yet had a Bandle City update.

It will become an icon when the region finally gets a lore update.

> [{quoted}](name=KestrelGirl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yQ0sqZGb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-25T03:11:08.325+0000)
>
> We simply have not yet had a Bandle City update.
> 
> It will become an icon when the region finally gets a lore update.

I totally get you, but they did give us this Crest. So you know, doesnt hurt to ask :)

I asked the same in another topic, and the most convincing answer I got was that we have yet to discover Bandle, and while this one is logical, I still fail to understand why we can't get Bandle's Icon now that Bandle City is in the map, even if it moves, to get another chance at unlocking it during the oficial discover

The Void's icon should also be given during this event as the Void is a fixed place in the map, even though it is only the doorway to the whole thing so they might be keeping it for the day when the true Void is revealed, around 2060

Hi there! For the re-released icons, we wanted to stick to the regions that were represented on the map. A void incursion is showed in Icathia of course, but since it is not a region it felt more cohesive to leave it off of the collection for Runeterra. That's not to say it won't make a return in the future. For Bandle City... well... lets just say that I am a big proponent of seeing it become a summoner icon and I imagine it will be when the timing is right ;)

I only down voted you because vague answers about bandle are getting discouraging and make me frustrated as a player. the only faction to not get an update yet, only some new artwork (which IS amazing, don't get me wrong) but no new lore??? I was seriously hoping for a bit more out of this, I love pretty much all the bandle champs and it's sad to see them basically collecting dust right now (lore wise, certainly they are being played lmao).

That's fair. I understand your feels here. I can't give you anything more concrete atm except to let you know that we hear you, its on our radar and we want to bring more lore to our furry friends sooner than later
Thank you for responding! I know this isn't concrete info but it does make me feel better, so I appreciate it!

So the narrative guy basically says they have big plans in store for Bandle City, and held off releasing an icon for it now ... and this worries you why? If anything, that should excite you, because that means it'll either get an event, VGU, or a new champion, and bring with it a lot of new lore ...

Quick question, any word on if we can ever see a Vastayan icon of sorts? It feels so out of place that the Darkin were able to get one, yet the Vastaya don't.

I understand that the Vastaya are more varied, but I feel like they can be tied together with a similar 'animal-kingdom-esque' aesthetic to their own logo.
inb4 the next reworked champ after nunu is corki or teemo :p
They are most likely not included because they aren't real places on the map,they are other dimensions and thus not real factions of the world.
